    • initialiseAPILink

      public static void initialiseAPILink()
      Initialises the API link for the server's connection to Spotify.

    • instantiateClientUser

      public static se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi instantiateClientUser()
      Instantiates a new client user under the server's API link for clients to connect to their Spotify account.
      Returns:
      SpotifyApi instance created to be added to a SpotifyUser instance

    • instantiatePreviousAccess

      public static se.michaelthelin.spotify.SpotifyApi instantiatePreviousAccess​(String refreshToken)
      Instantiates a new client user under the server's API link. Difference this has from instantiateClientUser() is that this is designed to refresh a previous connection using a refresh token, provided by a client.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the refresh token to be used for the refresh
      Returns:
      the instantiated client API

    • requestURI

      public static URI requestURI()
      Returns:
      the request URI for the server

      public static String getAccessToken()
      Returns:
